string.text: Enables a clan name change button and removes the annoying shadow at the bottom of the clan page in the encyclopedia. Recommended to toggle on and off as needed so you can choose the names of spawned clans yourself, particularly those in your kingdom. Default value is Disabled.
Enables spawning of clans after the destruction of another clan. Default is Enabled.
Enables spawning for Minor clans after the destruction of another Minor clan. Default is Disabled.
Sets the tier of the new clan(s) to the tier of the destroyed clan. Default is Disabled.
The number of clans to spawn for each destroyed clan. Default is 1.
Enables spawning of clans on an interval. Default is Disabled.
The frequency of clans to be spawned as a minor clan. Default is 0%.
The time interval type for spawning clans. Default is Daily.
The time interval value for spawning clans. Default is 1.
The number of clans to spawn each interval. Default is 1.

On destruction: Preserves the destroyed clan culture. On interval: Preserves the culture with the least clans. May pick a different culture on each iteration if 'Number Of Clans' is more than 1. Default is Enabled.

On destruction: Preserves the destroyed clan kingdom, or the kingdom with the least clans if one isn't found for the clan. Won't preserve kingdom of a mercenary clan. On interval: Preserves the kingdom with the least clans. Default is Disabled.

Displays an inquiry whenever the player kingdom is chosen to be preserved to allow the choice of refusing a newly created clan. Requires 'Preserve Kingdoms' to be enabled or it does nothing. Default is Disabled.
The minimum tier a spawned clan can have. Does nothing on destruction if 'Preserve Clan Tier' is enabled. Default is 0.
The maximum tier a spawned clan can have. Does nothing on destruction if 'Preserve Clan Tier' is enabled. Default is 4.

Allows usage of the custom clan naming xml in located in the ModuleData folder. Must reload your save to activate mid-game. Can be freely deactivated without harming your save game. Recommended value is Mixed. Default is Native Only.

Allows spawning of a clan if the chosen name is already taken by an existing clan. By default, the mod only chooses an existing clan name if an unused name does not exist. Clan creation will be canceled if no usable name is found. Default is None.
The troop types to fill each clan party with. Note: None starts the clan from scratch, and could make their progression extremely difficult. Default is Basic troops only.
Declares war on specified kingdom types when the clan is spawned. Clan(s) will have less of a chance of survival, but the option is there for chaos seekers. Default is None.
The minimum number of heroes for spawned clans. Default is 5.
The maximum number of heroes for spawned clans. Default is 10.
The minimum age of the leader hero for spawned clans. Default is 30.
The maximum age of the leader hero for spawned clans. Default is 50.
The minimum age of heroes for spawned clans. Default is 30.
The minimum age of heroes for spawned clans. Default is 50.
The minimum level for each skill. Cannot be higher than Maximum Skill Level. Default is 0.
The maximum level for each skill. Cannot be lower than Minimum Skill Level. Default is 175.
The minimum level for each personality trait. Cannot be higher than Maximum Personality Trait Level. Default is -2.
The maximum level for each personality traits. Cannot be lower than Maximum Personality Trait Level. Default is 2.
Percentage chance of heroes being female. Affects the leader hero. Default is 51% female.
The amount of gold the party leader(s) will start with. Default is 25k.
The extra amount of gold the party leader(s) will start with. Default is 5k.
A rising new clan, {CLAN_NAME}, has been spotted nearby and would like to serve our kingdom. Do you accept them?
A rising new clan, {CLAN_NAME}, has been spotted near {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.
